content: ChristopherTrimboli: Focused on improving the development and release infrastructure for the `elizaos/eliza` repository this month. He established a new alpha NPM release workflow (#5863) and subsequently unified the release process for all NPM packages (#5877). Christopher also delivered significant developer experience enhancements in a large PR (#5881, +1104/-327 lines) that improved the dev CLI, cleaned up logging, and optimized file watching. His work primarily involved changes to code and configuration files, reflecting his focus on tooling and build systems.
